alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Hendry and Glades Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 436 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Muse to near Lakeport. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Buckhead Ridge, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Ortona, Muse, Indian Prairie Canal Mouth, Lake Hicpochee, Harlem and Okee Tantie Recreation Area. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
